{
  "name": "plante-uma-casa",
  "main": "index.ts",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "expo start",
    "reset-project": "node ./scripts/reset-project.js",
    "android": "expo start --android",
    "ios": "expo start --ios",
    "web": "expo start --web",
    "lint": "expo lint",
    "_____ EXPO EAS _____": "_",
    "build:native:configure": "npx eas-cli build:configure",
    "eas:upd:preview": "npx eas-cli update --branch preview",
    "deploy:store:android1": "npx eas-cli build --platform android",
    "eas:build:android2": "npx eas-cli build -p android --profile preview",
    "eas:build:ios": "npx eas-cli build -p ios --profile preview",
    "eas:submit:ios": "npx eas-cli submit --platform ios",
    "export:web:clear": "npx expo export --platform web",
    "_____ START-HTTP-SERVER _____": "_",
    "server:web:build": "npx http-server",
    "_____ FIREBASE _____": "_",
    "firebase:init": "npx firebase-tools init",
    "firebase:projects-list": "npx firebase-tools projects:list",
    "firebase:set-project": "npx firebase-tools use xxxprj_name",
    "deploy:complete:web": "yarn export:web:clear && yarn deploy:hosting",
    "deploy:hosting": "npx firebase-tools deploy --only hosting",
    "firebase:login": "npx firebase-tools login",
    "firebase:login:ci:old": "npx firebase-tools login --no-localhost",
    "firebase:login:ci": "npx firebase-tools login --no-localhost",
    "deploy": "npx firebase-tools deploy --only functions"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@expo/metro-runtime": "~6.1.2",
    "@expo/vector-icons": "^15.0.2",
    "@react-navigation/bottom-tabs": "^7.3.10",
    "@react-navigation/elements": "^2.3.8",
    "@react-navigation/native": "^7.1.6",
    "css-to-react-native": "^3.2.0",
    "expo": "^54.0.10",
    "expo-auth-session": "^7.0.8",
    "expo-web-browser": "^15.0.8",
    "expo-blur": "~15.0.7",
    "expo-constants": "~18.0.9",
    "expo-font": "~14.0.8",
    "expo-haptics": "~15.0.7",
    "expo-image": "~3.0.8",
    "expo-image-picker": "~17.0.8",
    "expo-linking": "~8.0.8",
    "expo-router": "~6.0.8",
    "expo-splash-screen": "~31.0.10",
    "expo-status-bar": "~3.0.8",
    "expo-symbols": "~1.0.7",
    "expo-system-ui": "~6.0.7",
    "firebase": "^11.7.0",
    "react": "19.1.0",
    "react-dom": "19.1.0",
    "react-native": "0.81.4",
    "react-native-gesture-handler": "~2.28.0",
    "react-native-reanimated": "~4.1.0",
    "react-native-safe-area-context": "~5.6.0",
    "react-native-screens": "~4.16.0",
    "react-native-svg": "15.12.1",
    "react-native-web": "^0.21.0",
    "react-native-webview": "13.15.0",
    "react-native-worklets": "0.5.1",
    "zustand": "^5.0.4"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.25.2",
    "@types/react": "~19.1.10",
    "eslint": "^9.25.0",
    "eslint-config-expo": "~10.0.0",
    "typescript": "~5.9.2"
  },
  "private": true
}

type Tprops_dirSeed = { args: any; pass: {} };
export const dirSeed = (props: Tprops_dirSeed) => {};

type Tprops_fileSeed = { args: any; pass: {} };
export const fileSeed = (props: Tprops_fileSeed) => {};

export { dirSeed } from './dirSeed';
export { fileSeed } from './fileSeed';
